distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for ffmpeg fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-3109: Fixed null pointer dereference in vp3_decode_frame() (bsc#1206442).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: An issue was discovered in the FFmpeg package, where vp3_decode_frame in libavcodec/vp3.c lacks check of the return value of av_malloc() and will cause a null pointer dereference, impacting availability.
notes.title: CVE description
